text: FBT may refer to: * FBT (company), A Thai sport apparel brand * The Fame Ball Tour, a Lady Gaga tour * First Bank and Trust, an American bank * Flyback transformer * Fringe benefits tax ** Fringe benefits tax (Australia) ** Fringe benefits tax (New Zealand) ** Fringe benefits tax (India) * Folate-biopterin transporter family * Frost Bank Tower, in Austin, Texas, United States * Greg Mueller (born 1971), Canadian poker player, nicknamed FBT
title: FBT
